[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Integration: ValidatorVerifier] [Quorum Calculation] When CommitVotes are aggregated, does the system correctly handle validators with different voting powers, or could equal weighting allow minority to reach quorum? (Critical)

(High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Integration: BufferManager] [Vote Caching] When BufferManager caches CommitVotes in pending_commit_votes for blocks not yet in buffer, can stale votes be replayed after buffer reset? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Integration: BufferManager] [Aggregation Timing] Can CommitVotes arrive out-of-order, and does BufferManager properly handle votes for future rounds that haven't been executed yet? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Integration: BufferManager] [Signature Aggregator State] When CommitVotes are added to SignatureAggregator, can the verification_status race between insertion and aggregation verification? (Critical)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Cryptography: BLS] [Aggregation Commutativity] When aggregating CommitVote signatures, does non-commutative aggregation order allow attackers to cause different aggregate signatures for same vote set? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Cryptography: BLS] [Rogue Key Attack] Can a malicious validator generate a public key specifically to cancel out other validators' signatures in CommitVote aggregation? (Critical)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Cryptography: BLS] [Subgroup Check] Does CommitVote signature verification perform subgroup checks on BLS points, or could invalid curve points cause verification bypasses? (Critical)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Cryptography: BLS] [Signature Aggregation Limit] Is there a maximum number of CommitVote signatures that can be aggregated before hitting BLS signature size limits? (Medium)
